documents.documentName: Please provide a name for the document
documents.confirmClose: Are you sure you want to close this tab?
documents.multipleFilesError: Only one file can be loaded at a time
documents.invalidJsonError: The file content is not a valid JSON format. Please check the file and try again.
documents.geoJsonError: File must contain a GeoJSON FeatureCollection or Feature
documents.localSaveNotSupported: Local save not supported in browser

controlPanel.lockViewport: Lock viewport to prevent accidental map movement. When time filtering, mouse wheel updates time
controlPanel.enableTimeControls: Enable time controls, to filter tracks by time
controlPanel.copySnapshot: Copy snapshot of map to the clipboard
controlPanel.lockViewportFirst: Lock the viewport in order to take a snapshot of the map

layers.selectNonTrack: Select non-track items to enable copy
layers.noValidData: No valid GeoJSON data in clipboard
layers.selectTimeFeature: Select a time-related feature to enable graphs
